id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of a citation must not be empty!
id.pattern: The RDC-ID must contain only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts and ÃŸ.
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.

author.size: The max length of the author is 128 signs.

booktitle.size: The max length of the booktitle is 2048 signs.

chapter.size: The max length of the chapter is 128 signs.

edition.size: The max length of the edition is 128 signs.

editor.size: The max length of the editor is 128 signs.

institution.size: The max length of the institution is 128 signs.

journal.size: The max length of the journal is 128 signs.

title.size: The max length of the title is 2048 signs.

series.size: The max length of the series is 128 signs.

volume.size: The max length of the volumes is 32 signs.

type.size: The max length of the type is 128 signs.

pages.size: The max length of the pages is 32 signs.

publisher.size: The max length of the publisher is 128 signs.

organization.size: The max length of the organization is 128 signs.

number.size: The max length of the number is 32 signs.

school.size: The max length of the school is 128 signs.

note.size: The max length of the note is 2048 signs.

how-published.size: The max length of the how published is 128 signs.

citation-string.not-empty: The citation string of a citation must not be empty!
citation-string.size: The max length of the citation string is 128 signs.

source-reference.not-empty: The source reference of a citation must not be empty!
source-reference.size: The max length of the source reference is 2048 signs.
